title: 109_hr1949
content:
Reliquidation of certain entries of candles is mandated by the Bureau of Customs and Border Protection within 90 days of the enactment of this Act. This involves reliquidating specified entries without imposing antidumping duties or interest, and refunding any previously paid antidumping duties and interest. The affected entries are listed in subsection (b). Entry numbers and dates for entries at Los Angeles and Detroit ports:
110-3447557-3, 03/18/00, Los Angeles
110-3447591-2, 03/19/00, Los Angeles
110-3447595-3, 03/19/00, Los Angeles
110-1201638-1, 03/21/00, Detroit
110-1201639-9, 03/21/00, Detroit
110-1201640-7, 03/21/00, Detroit
110-3447613-4, 03/21/00, Los Angeles 110-1201697-7, 03/23/00, Detroit
110-1201695-1, 03/23/00, Detroit
110-1201696-9, 03/23/00, Detroit
110-1201756-1, 03/27/00, Detroit
110-1201757-9, 03/27/00, Detroit
110-1201758-7, 03/27/00, Detroit
110-1740905-2, 03/30/00, Los Angeles
110-1740943-3, 03/30/00, Los Angeles 110-1201845-2, 03/31/00, Detroit

110-3447959-1, 04/11/00, Los Angeles Dates and locations of shipments:
- 04/11/00, Los Angeles
- 04/12/00, Detroit
- 04/14/00, Los Angeles Shipments on 04/14/00 and 04/20/00 in Los Angeles, and on 04/25/00 in Detroit. Shipments on 04/27/00 and 04/28/00 in Los Angeles and Memphis, followed by shipments on 05/04/00, 05/07/00, and 05/23/00 in Memphis. Shipments on 05/23/00 and 05/25/00 in Memphis, 05/26/00 in Detroit, Los Angeles, and Memphis. Shipments on various dates to Los Angeles, Norfolk, and Detroit in July and August 2000. Shipments were made to Detroit and Los Angeles on various dates in September 2000. Shipments were made to Norfolk, Detroit, and Los Angeles in September and October 2000. Shipments were made to Los Angeles and Detroit in October and November 2000. Shipments were made to Detroit, Los Angeles, and Tampa in November 2000. Shipments were sent to Detroit and Los Angeles in November 2000. Shipments were sent to Detroit in December 2000.
